name: World Championship Spelling
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Get ready to start mixing it up with World Championship Spelling, a brilliantly addictive new puzzling phenomenon!


Test your spelling skills and master thousands of words, then challenge your friends to a multi-player game. Try keeping the pace as the frantic challenges increase in speed and complexity. Easy to learn, but difficult to master, World championship Spelling is the ultimate pick up and play puzzler!

(screenshot captions)
  • MULTIPLAYER VERSUS MODE AND SHARING SUPPORT
  • 5 SINGLE PLAYER GAME MODES INCLUDING FREEHAND, QUICKDRAW, PAINTER AND PUZZLE
  • UNIQUE AND COMPELLING MIX-IT-UP GAMEPLAY
